INSERT INTO t_first_transfer_detail( FIRST_TRANSFER_ID, FIRST_BORROW_ID, FIRST_USE_MONEY, FIRST_COLLECTION_CAPITAL, FIRST_TENDER_TIME, MANAGE_FEE_MONTH, MANAGE_FEE_RATIO, ADD_TIME, REMARK, FIRST_REPAY_INTEREST, BORROW_COUNT, BORROW_MONTHS, BORROW_APRS ) VALUES( #{firstTransferId}, #{firstBorrowId}, #{firstUseMoney}, #{firstCollectionCapital}, #{firstTenderTime}, #{manageFeeMonth}, #{manageFeeRatio}, #{addtime}, #{remark}, #{firstRepayInterest}, #{borrowCount}, #{borrowMonths}, #{borrowAprs} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
